contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox adult biography | name = Racquel Darrian | image= Raquel darrian.jpg | caption = | birth_name = Kelly Jackson<ref name=ReviewJournal/> | birth_date = {{birth date and age|mf=yes|1968|7|21}}<ref name=ReviewJournal/> | birth_place = [[Hutchinson, Kansas]], [[United States|U.S.]]<ref name="iafd">{{cite web | title = Personal Bio Racquel Darrian | publisher = IAFD.com|url =http://www.iafd.com/person.rme/perfid=Racquel/gender=f/Racquel-Darrian.htm| accessdate = 2008-01-10 }}</ref> | death_date = | death_place = | spouse = | height = {{height|ft=5|in=6}}<ref name="iafd"/> | weight = | eye_color = Hazel | hair_color = Brown | ethnicity = [[Indigenous peoples of the Americas|American Indian]]/Caucasian<ref name="iafd"/> | alias = Raquel Darrian, Raquel Darian, Racquel, R. Devon, R. Davon, R. Damian, R. Damien, R. Derrian, Kelly Jackson, Raquel Corben<ref name="iafd"/> | number_of_films = 102 (per IAFD) | website = http://www.racqueldarrian.com | spelling = <!-- US for color, UK for colour --> }} '''Racquel Darrian''' (born '''Kelly Jackson''' on July 21, 1968 in [[Hutchinson, Kansas]]<ref name=ReviewJournal>[http://www.reviewjournal.com/lvrj_home/2007/Feb-14-Wed-2007/news/11787830.html "Porn star bares all except lawsuit against ex"], by Frank Geary, ''[[Las Vegas Review-Journal]]'', February 14, 2007. Retrieved 2007-09-19.</ref>) is an [[United States|American]] former [[pornographic actor|pornographic actress]]. She started her career as a nude model posing for [[lesbian]]-themed photoshoots. When she crossed over to adult film, she initially performed only in "all-girl" scenes. As offers increased for her to participate in heterosexual scenes, she began working onscreen with Derrick Lane (whom she married in 1994). She signed an exclusive contract with [[Vivid Video]]; eventually tiring of constantly working with Lane, she insisted on working with other men. Darrian divorced from Derrick Lane in 2000.<ref name=ReviewJournal /> Darrian is sometimes referred to as the "brunette goddess of porn".<ref name=ReviewJournal /> She was the October 1990 ''[[Penthouse (magazine)|Penthouse]]'' [[Pet of the Month]], as Kelly Jackson,<ref name=ReviewJournal /> and in ''[[Playboy]]'''s 1996 pictorial "Strippers". She currently lives in Las Vegas.<ref name=ReviewJournal /> == Awards == * [[AVN Awards|AVN]] Hall of Fame inductee * 1993 [[AVN Award]] winner – Best Tease Performance – ''Bonnie and Clyde'' * 2000 AVN Award nominee – Best Actress (film) – ''Original Sin''<ref>{{cite web|url= http://www.avn.com/awards/noms.html|title= AVN 2000 Nominations|accessdate= 2008-11-24|publisher= [[AVN (magazine)|AVN]]|archiveurl= http://web.archive.org/web/20000123103017/www.avn.com/awards/noms.html|archivedate= 2000-01-23}}</ref> == References == {{reflist}} ==External links== {{commons category}} * [http://www.lukeisback.com/stars/stars/stars/female/racquel_darrian.html Racquel Darrian biography on lukeisback.com] * [http://www.racqueldarrian.com/ Official Website] * {{IMDb name|0001106|Racquel Darrian}} * {{iafd name|id=Racquel|gender=female|name=Racquel Darrian}} * {{afdb name|id=69|gender=female|name=Racquel Darrian}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Darrian, Racquel | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = American pornographic actor | DATE OF BIRTH = July 21, 1968 | PLACE OF BIRTH = [[Hutchinson, Kansas]], [[United States|U.S.]] | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Darrian, Racquel}} [[Category:1968 births]] [[Category:American female adult models]] [[Category:American female pornographic film actors]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:Penthouse Pets]] [[Category:People from Hutchinson, Kansas]] [[Category:Pornographic film actors from Kansas]]
